snippet.title: FRAME OF MIND - RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Download for free! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1485250/Frame_of_Mind/

Step into the deteriorating mind in Frame of Mind, a surreal first-person puzzle game.

In Frame of Mind, you are placed in a world where logic is escaping you. Each area of the game defies reason, requiring you to think outside the box in order to solve the illogical and escape madness.

This game was made by [Sample Text] Studios, a group of 6 in their 2nd year studying Bachelor of Software Engineering and Bachelor of Creative Technologies at Media Design School, New Zealand.

Find us at:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/SampleTextLtd
website - https://www.sampletextstudios.com/

Artists:
Ben Aitkenhead - https://bit.ly/3jZS5ks
Stuart Whittaker - https://bit.ly/3jVhc89
Tyler Parkinson - https://bit.ly/2Psi0U5

Programmers:
Ben Zaher - https://twitter.com/theselrate
David Haverland - https://twitter.com/Nerdatr0n
Justin Yuen - https://twitter.com/TheRealSmaugler
